name: Ticket
description: Used to describe a ticket to an event, a flight, a bus ride, etc.
title: Ticket

fields.name: underName
fields.title: underName
fields.description: The person or organization the reservation or ticket is for.

fields.name: dateIssued
fields.title: dateIssued
fields.description: The date the ticket was issued.

fields.name: totalPrice
fields.title: totalPrice
fields.description: The total price for the reservation or ticket, including applicable taxes, shipping etc

fields.name: priceCurrency
fields.title: priceCurrency
fields.description: The currency of the price, or a price component when attached to PriceSpecification and its subtypes.Use standard formats: ISO 4217 currency format e.g. USD

fields.name: ticketNumber
fields.title: ticketNumber
fields.description: The unique identifier for the ticket.

fields.name: issuedBy
fields.title: issuedBy
fields.description: The organization issuing the ticket or permit.

fields.name: ticketToken
fields.title: ticketToken
fields.description: Reference to an asset (e.g., Barcode, QR code image or PDF) usable for entrance.

fields.name: ticketedSeat
fields.title: ticketedSeat
fields.description: The seat associated with the ticket.
